title: Post Game: Does Durbin speak for the White House on Ukraine?
description: As Russian troops remain at the Ukrainian border, Sen. Dick Durbin (D-Ill.) talks about a possible diplomatic resolution. NBC News correspondent Carol Lee joins Chuck to talk about the latest.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: As Russian troops remain at the Ukrainian border, Sen. Dick Durbin (D-Ill.) talks about a possible diplomatic resolution. NBC News correspondent Carol Lee joins Chuck to talk about the latest.
